1. Before use, make sure that the power supply of the instrument is normal. After the instrument is initialized, start the olfactory detection application on the mobile device, and the application will automatically connect to the instrument; you must ensure that the mobile device is successfully connected to the olfactory testing instrument. If the connection is normal, a green WIFI prompt will appear in the upper right corner of the application symbol. If the connection fails, it will be displayed as a red WIFI symbol. In this case, please try to connect manually through the management page. If you still cannot connect, please restart the instrument and the application.
2. Select the appropriate test. Before starting the test, please follow the system prompts and enter your personal information.
3. After the test is completed, you can return to the main interface or exit the application

1. Welcome to use this olfactory recognition function test instrument! During the test, you need to follow the guidelines to smell and identify a series of common odors. The smell will be presented through the sniffing head. You need to breathe and smell normally 3-5cm away from the sniffing head; it is recommended that you take a short breath and short sniff.
2. Please follow the instructions of the administrator to select the appropriate test
3. Please enter your personal information, after confirming that it is correct, please click Next
4. Please enter your personal information, after confirming that it is correct, please click Next

5. After the first sniffing, a pop-up window will appear. If you have not noticed any smell, you can choose No and prepare to sniff again! The number of re-sniffing can be set by the administrator in the management interface.

6. After the sniffing is complete, enter the four options and answer the interface. You must double-click to select the most similar odor picture according to the odor you smell. If you are not sure, you must guess

3. Before you start to answer the question, you will have 3s to sniff the smell, and then a prompt box will pop up, asking if you smell the smell; then you can choose the picture you think is correct according to the identified smell
Please go to the management page to view detailed answer information
Performing this operation will delete the contents of the database and cannot be recovered.
Please switch the WIFI to an available network and disconnect the WIFI LAN connection of the instrument to submit feedback information online.
Please select the Excel data sheet export directory
Performing this operation will delete all the contents in the database and cannot be recovered. Please make sure that the data has been exported before confirming the deletion.

This parameter modifies the duration of odor emission. It is strictly prohibited for non-professionals to alter this parameter, as doing so will directly affect the duration of odor stimulation and the test results.

This parameter will change the lead time of odor release. Non-professionals are strictly prohibited to change this parameter, which will directly affect the start time of odor stimulation and affect the test results.
You are welcome to put forward your valuable suggestions for improvement. Your suggestions and comments are the driving force for our improvement!
Please enter your feedback (the body of the feedback email should be within 500 words)
The number of re-sniffable currently set:

Click the button in the middle of the screen to start the test. After the 3s countdown, when the \"smell\" prompt appears, please take the initiative to approach the sniffing head to sniff and identify the smell
(Email subject) Data storage and export issues
If not sure, click here to smell it again
Do you want to exit the current page? Logout will not retain any data
Please enter the opening time in advance,please enter an integer second, unit /s
The opening time in advance should be less than 3s
Please enter the duration of odor release, unit/s
The test has been completed, thanks for using! ! !
Press again to exit the program
You have used all the retry counts, you can no longer retry
Return to the test selection interface
Whether to exit the current simulation test interface?
Click here to perform identification mock tests
Click here to perform the identification function test, including 12 identification function tests and 20 identification function tests

Click here to enter the background management interface. You can configure the interface language of the app in the background management interface, set the test parameters of the olfactory recognition test, and you can view the results of each test .
The IP address does not exist, please check
The connection is abnormal or refused, please check
Connection error, data sending failed, please try again
SIT - Coustom smell identification test odor selection
